title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
The response can earn up to 2 points:

1 point: For the correct answer

1 point: For correct justification

The acceleration is negative on the intervals 0 < t < 1 and 4 < t < 6 since velocity is decreasing on these intervals.
descriptions:
The response earns none of the following points:

1 point: For the correct answer

1 point: For correct justification

The acceleration is negative on the intervals 0 < t < 1 and 4 < t < 6 since velocity is decreasing on these intervals.

The response earns one of the following points:

1 point: For the correct answer

1 point: For correct justification

The acceleration is negative on the intervals 0 < t < 1 and 4 < t < 6 since velocity is decreasing on these intervals.

The response earns two of the following points:

1 point: For the correct answer

1 point: For correct justification

The acceleration is negative on the intervals 0 < t < 1 and 4 < t < 6 since velocity is decreasing on these intervals.
